body_html:
As you can see on the PR, there have been some modifications in the master branch that are avoiding this former the be merged. Do you know how to do that? Would you need help for this? Are your coaches able to help you?
If you decide to do it through "rebasing" your feature branch on the master branch, you might want to take this occasion to reduce your number of commit. Do you know how to do this? (see http://git-scm.com/book/en/Git-Tools-Rewriting-History#Squashing-Commits)

If you decide to do it through "rebasing" your feature branch on the master branch, you might want to take this occasion to reduce your number of commit. Do you know how to do this? (see http://git-scm.com/book/en/Git-Tools-Rewriting-History#Squashing-Commits)
body:
As you can see on the PR, there have been some modifications in the master branch that are avoiding this former the be merged. Do you know how to do that? Would you need help for this? Are your coaches able to help you?
If you decide to do it through "rebasing" your feature branch on the master branch, you might want to take this occasion to reduce your number of commit. Do you know how to do this? (see http://git-scm.com/book/en/Git-Tools-Rewriting-History#Squashing-Commits)
